references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive technical report on the GPT-4 model, which is highly relevant to the field of large language models and their applications in visual generation.

references.paper_title: Training diffusion models with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper explores the use of reinforcement learning in training diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the approach used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Pick-a-Pic: An open dataset of user preferences for text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper presents Pick-a-Pic, a dataset of human preferences for text-to-image generation, which is used as a foundation for the training data in this paper.

references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Imagen Video, a high-definition video generation model that is relevant to the research in this paper.
This paper introduces a zero-shot text-to-image generation method, which is a foundational work in the field and highly relevant to the context of the paper.
